definition: weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

sentences.english: On the other hand, a newscast showing a newscaster's head can use a much lower bit rate.
sentences.chinese: 图像相对静止的新闻节目可以使用低得多的码率。

sentences.english: The three-step search (TSS) algorithm has been widely used as the motion estimation technique in some low bit-rate video compression application.
sentences.chinese: 三步搜索法已经广泛地应用于低码率图像压缩中。

sentences.english: The error code rate of the dispatching system were calculated in greater detail.
sentences.chinese: 并对调度系统的误码率进行了详细计算。

sentences.english: Simulation results show that the performance of this system is good.
sentences.chinese: 仿真分析表明，该方法可获得有较好的误码率性能。

sentences.english: At last, the relationship of BER and BPF group delay is shown.
sentences.chinese: 给出了误码率与BPF群时延的关系。

sentences.english: As you can see, the exact length and the average bitrate is given.
sentences.chinese: 正如你看到的那样，精确的长度和平均码率已给出。

sentences.english: Our results support the feasibility of communication at high-speed bit rate over the diffuse infrared channel.
sentences.chinese: 仿真结果显示高码率无线红外室内通信的可行性。

sentences.english: This paper puts forward a memoryless and rate-based optimal data partitioning algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了基于码率的最优数据划分算法。

sentences.english: In addition, the performance of the algorithm of the varied bit-rates is improved.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在不同码率情况下，算法的性能也得到了提升。

sentences.english: For the problem solving, the thesis study rate control of the video encoder.
sentences.chinese: 要解决这些问题就需要研究编码器的码率控制。

sentences.english: It is hard to avoid mistakes.
The algorithm reduces error probabilities of detection by exploiting BCH code and matched filtering.
sentences.chinese: 该算法采用BCH编码和匹配滤波来降低误码率。

definition: (computing) transcoding/to convert (from one encoding to another)
standard definition (TV or video image quality)
